pli-tv-pvr1.12:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr1.12:0.4: 4. The section on being found in
pli-tv-pvr1.12:1.1: (1) The offenses that are a result of having sexual intercourse, in how many of the seven classes of offenses are they found?
pli-tv-pvr1.12:1.3: it may be in the class of offence involving Defeat; it may be in the class of offence that is a very grave one; it may be in the class of offence of Expiation; it may be in the class of offence of wrong-doing …
pli-tv-pvr1.12:2.1: Because of, out of disrespect … spitting in water …
pli-tv-pvr1.12:2.3: in the class of offence of wrong-doing.
